Articles.Content:
I bought and downloaded two Mac versions (regular and installer) and this won't work. The Launcher says I have to update, but there are no Mac updates for the versions I downloaded. If I run KSP (not Launcher) it puts me in a startup mode that never finished, looping through the same installation messages over and over.

 

KSP version 5.4.0p4 (b15b5ae035b7) AKA Mac version 1.2.2

Bought on the website.

Running iMac Retina, Core i5 3,3 Ghz, 24 GB Ram, 2 TB free HD, OS 10.12.2

 

build id = 01622
2016-12-06_08-18-38
Branch: master

 

 

Can't upload screenshot. Startup screen says "Loading Asset Bundle Definitions."

 

http://imgur.com/a/TOMxs

Edited December 17, 2016 by Withan
Added info
